document.full_text: a combination of two experimental drugs from vertex pharmaceuticals inc showed promise for cystic fibrosis patients in the first part of a midstage study, the company said on thursday.
document.title: vertex cystic fibrosis combo shows promise
lines_and_colors: a combination of two experimental drugs from vertex pharmaceuticals inc showed promise for cystic fibrosis patients in the first part of a midstage study, the company said on thursday.
